additionalnotes.value: If ANC is greater than or equal to 1.5 AND Plts are greater than or equal to 100 x 109/L: Give as ordered. If ANC is less than 1.5 OR Plts are less than 100 x 109/L: Delay 1 week. If Creatinine Clearance is greater than or equal to 50 mL/minute: Give as ordered. If Creatinine Clearance is less than 50 mL/minute: Contact physician.
